metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12105 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the way that the Blenderopen-source 3d creation suite v2.78c applies a particular object modifierto a Mesh. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflowresulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under thecontext of the application. An attacker can convince a user to open thefile or use the file as a library in order to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
